Question.ChosenAnswer: Go to Bookmarks -> Organize Bookmarks. In the left pane, click Bookmarks Menu. At the top, click Views -> Sort -> By Name.

Answer.Content: Go to Bookmarks -> Organize Bookmarks. In the left pane, click Bookmarks Menu. At the top, click Views -> Sort -> By Name.
